mapper.select: select * from (select spot.*, rownum r from (select * from spot order by num) spot) where r>=#{startRow} and r<=#{endRow}
mapper.insert: insert into spot(num, status, name, read, score, phone, addr, lng, lat, image, page, cate, tag, reg) values(998, 0, #{name}, 0, 0, #{phone}, #{addr}, #{lng}, #{lat}, #{image}, #{page}, #{cate}, #{tag}, sysdate)
